name: GetSlackConversationMembers
description:
Retrieve members from a specified Slack conversation.

Use this tool to get a list of members in a specific Slack conversation. This can apply to public and private channels, as well as direct and multi-party direct message conversations. Appropriate OAuth scopes are required to access different types of conversations.

parameters.name: conversation_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Slack conversation to retrieve members from. This can be a channel, group, or direct message.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination, set to the `next_cursor` value from a previous response to continue retrieving members from a conversation.

parameters.name: max_items_to_return
parameters.description: The maximum number of conversation members to return. Recommended to specify a value under 1000, with no more than 200 results at a time for optimal pagination. (default: '100')

parameters.name: auth_token
parameters.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: ID of the conversation to retrieve members for

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Paginate through collections of data by setting the `cursor` parameter to a `next_cursor` attribute returned by a previous request's `response_metadata`. Default value fetches the first "page" of the collection.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return. Fewer than the requested number of items may be returned, even if the end of the users list hasn't been reached.
